articles.author: Michelle Mannering
articles.description: Our community has shipped lots of open source project updates in the last month. Here's a few of our staff picks.
articles.title: Release Radar · February 2022 Edition

articles.author: Cameron Booth
articles.description: It is now possible to re-run only failed jobs or a single job in GitHub Actions workflows.
articles.title: Save time with partial re-runs in GitHub Actions

articles.author: Melody Mileski
articles.description: We've introduced several new features to help enterprise owners more easily manage their accounts, including two features now in public beta.
articles.title: Improved management for GitHub Enterprise owners

articles.author: Jakub Oleksy
articles.description: In February, we experienced one incident resulting in significant impact to multiple GitHub services.
articles.title: GitHub Availability Report: February 2022

articles.author: Thomas Dohmke
articles.description: As the global response to the tragedies in Ukraine and other impacted regions continues to evolve, I wanted to share with our community an expansion of the message that I shared earlier this week with our Hubbers.
articles.title: Our response to the war in Ukraine

articles.author: Ben De St Paer-Gotch
articles.description: Explore and understand your overall GitHub-hosted Actions runner capacity with the new runner view.
articles.title: A new way to understand your GitHub-hosted runner capacity

articles.author: Tanmayee Kamath
articles.description: The ability to prebuild codespaces is entering public beta. Enable fast environment creation times, regardless of the size and complexity of your repositories.
articles.title: Codespaces for the largest repositories just got faster

articles.author: Pulkit Agarwal
articles.description: GitHub Actions workflows in the Security category will now appear among the workflow recommendations based on a repository's content.
articles.title: Get started with ease using security workflows!

articles.author: Kate Catlin
articles.description: Anyone can now provide additional information to further the community’s understanding and awareness of security advisories.
articles.title: GitHub Advisory Database now open to community contributions

sources.title: Visual Studio Code - Code Editing. Redefined.

articles.title: Visual Studio Code February 2022
